name: BLT Maker DX
description:
BLT Maker is about a dystopian world where the last survivors of earth live in a single city. But that isn't important, as the game is about making a BLT sandwich for some guy.

This is my first game! It is incredibly simple but I hope you enjoy it. There are 23 different* endings to see! There is a story mode and a quick play option.

Change the world. Make the sandwich.
